decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no.NLA/2MP.101 Rev A, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no.NLA/2MP.102 Rev A, Proposed Roof Plan drawing no.NLA/2MP.103 Issue A, Proposed Front and Rear Elevation drawing no.NLA/2MP.104 Rev B, Proposed Side Elevation drawing no.NLA/2MP.105 Rev B and Proposed Site Plan drawing no.NLA/2MP.107 Issue A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Plan Document (2013) and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013 and National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section12, policy D3 of London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 3.1(b) and 3.8 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
description: Two storey side extension, single storey rear extension (following demolition of side conservatory and rear addition) and single storey front porch extension (following demolition of existing porch)
